New Records: Ronald Acuña Jr. hit his 37th home run of the season, rapidly approaching the coveted 40/60 milestone
Key Match Events: Ronald Acuña Jr. hit a two-run shot in the fifth inning to break a 1–1 deadlock with the Phillies
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson expressed dissatisfaction with Ronald Acuña Jr.'s celebratory antics, suggesting he'd be peeved if a member of his own team acted in a similar fashion
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves won the game 7–6 in extra innings
Ronald Acuña Jr. is approaching the 40/60 milestone and would be the first player in MLB history with 40 home runs and 60 stolen bases
